skills.Name: Dark Strike: Death Mark
skills.Description: Stacks Death Mark when using damage skills.

skills.Name: Double Thrust: Death Mark
skills.Description: Stacks Death Mark when using damage skills.

skills.Name: Abyssal Blaze: Death Mark
skills.Description: Stacks Death Mark when using damage skills.

skills.Name: Ancient Sword Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 5.2 when using an ancient sword.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: When equipped with light armor, increases P. Def. by 2.2 and Evasion by 3, and decreases the enemy's Critical Rate/Damage by 5%.

skills.Name: Magic Immunity
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 11.

skills.Name: Rapier Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 3.2 when using a short sword.

skills.Name: Soul Mastery
skills.Description: Absorbs souls. 294 or more XP is needed to absorb a soul. There is a 15% chance of absorbing an additional soul on a Critical. Maximum of 12 souls can be absorbed.

skills.Name: Dark Strike
skills.Description: Unleash the darkness inside you with a slash dealing 285 Physical Damage. Requires a sword, ancient sword or rapier. Over-hit and Critical hit are possible. Ignores shield defense. Regains MP

skills.Name: Double Thrust
skills.Description: Attacks the enemy with 285 Power added to P. Atk. Increases Power upon the consumption of up to 5 souls. Requires a short sword to be equipped. Over-hit. Regains MP.

skills.Name: Abyssal Blaze
skills.Description: Inflicts dark damage on the enemy with 380 Power added to P. Atk. Increases Power upon the consumption of up to 5 souls.

skills.Name: Contagion: Death Mark
skills.Description: Stacks Death Mark when using damage skills.

skills.Description: Provokes the target to attack with 4200 Power.
